title: Relationship of electoral and party system in UK

content.question: Identify the party with the majority of seats in the House of Commons. Identify the electoral system in Great Britain. Explain how the electoral system affects party representation in the House of Commons.

frqParts.text: Identify the party with the majority of seats in the House of Commons. Identify the electoral system in Great Britain. Explain how the electoral system affects party representation in the House of Commons.

unit.text: 4: Party and Electoral Systems and Citizen Organizations

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe political systems, principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors.
